title: [Ta'Illistim, Fraendel Court]
description: Multi-leveled residences line either side of the street, each containing etched glaesine windows adorned with bright window coverings.  The neighbors appear to be trying to best each other in some sort of competition for attention.  As you gaze at each dwelling, something different catches your eye with each glance.

Multi-leveled residences line either side of the street, each containing etched glaesine windows adorned with bright window coverings.  The neighbors appear to be trying to best each other in some sort of competition for attention, and as you gaze at each dwelling, something different catches your eye with each glance.

Multi-leveled residences line either side of the street, each containing stained glass windows colored in bright jewel tone hues.  On the steps of one building, a pile of parchments is weighted down by a cast silver peacock, which has fallen over on its side.
